name: Admiral
description: Aggressive but smooth bittering with an orange-citrus and herbal resonance

name: Bitter Gold
description: Use for bittering only, has no notable aroma

name: Bravo
description: Spicy, earthy, and lightly floral aroma

name: Bullion
description: Elements of spice and dark fruits

name: Newport
description: Clean bitterness, flavors of wine and balsamic

name: Sorachi Ace
description: Flavors of lemon citrus, orange, dill, cilantro

name: Sovereign
description: Complex aroma, subtle notes of green-tea and vanilla

name: Tillicum®
description: Elements of stone fruit and citrus

name: Ahtanum™
description: Distinct citrus chracter with notes of grapefruit

name: Aramis
description: Sweet with notes of spice, citrus and herbs

name: Atlas
description: Intense notes of lime, blossom, and pine

name: Boadicea
description: Delicate aroma of orchard blossoms and grass. Subtle spicy character.

name: Canadian Redvine
description: Mild cherry flavor, grapefruit peel aroma

name: Cascade (Australia)
description: Same as Cascade (US) but with notes of grapefruit

name: Cekin
description: European aroma, similar to Styrian hops

name: Columbia
description: Pungent hoppy kick, twist of lemon citrus

name: Crystal
description: Woody, floral and fruity with spice notes of cinnamon, nutmeg and black pepper

name: East Kent Golding
description: Aromas of lavender, spice, honey, thyme, earthy flavors

name: El Dorado ®
description: Flavors of tropical fruit, pineapple, mango. Aromas of pear, watermelon, stone fruit and candy.

name: Equinox
description: Notes of lemon and lime citrus, fruits like papaya and apple, green peppers and herbs

name: Golding (BC)
description: Exhibits an earthy aroma profile with a flavor profile of smooth, rounded spice.

name: Hallertau (NZ)
description: Distinct lime ‘zing’, delicately floral, clean tasting

name: Hallertau Blanc
description: Flavors of white-wine and fruit, aromas of cassis, elderflower, grapes, grapefruit and lemongrass.

name: Hallertauer Tradition
description: Earthy, grassy, aromas of nectar fruits
substitutesString: Retains 65%-70% alpha acid after 6 months storage at 20ºC (68ºF)

name: Helga
description: Noble-style aroma, mildly floral and spicy

name: Hüll Melon
description: Intensely fruity, flavors and aromas of honeydew melon, strawberry

name: Ivanhoe
description: Mellow aroma of citrus and pine. Heady floral and herbal notes.

name: Jester®
description: Tropical fruit, grapefruit, blackcurrant, hints of lychee

name: Kohatu®
description: Intense tropical fuit and pine needle aroma

name: Mount Rainier
description: Hallertau-like aroma, notes of citrus and licorice

name: Pacific Jade
description: Flavors of lemon citrus and cracked pepper

name: Pacifica
description: Citrusy, spicy, orange and floral aromas

name: Palisade®
description: Flavors of nectar fruits and citrus, aromas that are floral, herbaceous and grassy

name: Progress
description: Sweet flavor, Fuggle-like aromas of grass, mint and earth. Subtle bitterness.

name: Red Earth
description: Spicy, woody aroma and flavor with an undernote of citrus

name: Santiam
description: Soft, herbal, floral, fruity aromas with hints of pepper and spice

name: Saphir
description: Sweet citrus aromas with hints of tangerine

name: Serebrianka
description: Continental aroma and taste with hints of black tea, herbs and tobacco

name: Sladek
description: Classic hoppy aroma, flavors of peach passionfruit and grapefruit

name: Sonnet
description: Deep floral aroma, grass, earth, flavors of oak and honey

name: Strisselspalt
description: Pleasant continental-style aroma, herbal, floral, spicy, citrus, fruit

name: Styrian Golding
description: Resinous and earthy with hints of white pepper

name: Summer
description: Subtle flavors of apricot, melon, peach and grass

name: Sussex
description: Delicate tropical flavors and a unique fruit-forward aroma

name: Sylva
description: Flavors of the forest and fresh-cut timber, subtle and hoppy bohemian-style aroma

name: Tahoma
description: Subtle flavors and aromas of lemon citrus, orange, wood and spice

name: Tettnanger
description: Balanced floral and herbal aromas with some spiciness

name: Topaz
description: Light, tropical fruit flavors of lychee, clove-like spice and resinous grassy tones when dry hopped

name: Wai-iti
description: Lime citrus and stone fruit notes

name: Zythos®
description: Notes of tangerine, grapefruit, pine and pineapple

name: African Queen
description: Fruit forward with blackcurrant and passion fruit

name: Azacca ®
description: Aromas of tropical fruits and citrus. Tasting notes of spicy mango, pineapple, tangerine and pine.

name: Belma®
description: Notes of orange, melon, strawberry, pineapple with a hint of grapefruit

name: Bouclier
description: Aromas of herb, grass and spice alongside a citrus and floral character

name: Bramling Cross
description: Notes of lemon, blackcurrant, blackberries and plums particularly when used as a late addition.

name: Calicross
description: Floral, fruity and earthy flavor and aroma

name: Caliente
description: Falvors of citrus, peach and pine, aromas of stone fruit and mandarin

name: Calypso
description: Crisp, fruity aroma. Flavour of Apples, pears, stone fruit and lime citrus.

name: Cascade (New Zealand)
description: Similar to Cascade (US) but more subdued

name: Cascade (US)
description: Floral, with elements of citrus and notes of grapefruit

name: Centennial
description: Earthy and floral with an element of citrus

description: Citrus, grapefruit, lime, tropical fruits, harsh bitterness

description: Falvors of citrus, peach and pine, aromas of stone fruit and mandarin

name: Herkules
description: Notes of melon, black pepper and pine

name: Legacy®
description: Notes of blackberry, black currant, orange and grapefruit. Floral and spicy.

name: Marynka
description: Earthy and herbal flavors and aromas

name: Melba
description: Clean spicy bitterness, aromas of passionfruit, grapefruit and citrus.

name: MultiHead
description: Heady, floral aroma, some sweet fruit and citrus

name: Nelson Sauvin
description: Smooth bittering, rich, fruity, gooseberry and white-wine flavors

name: Northdown
description: Fresh, flowery, piney, berry and spice

name: Nugget

name: Opal
description: Flavors of spice and citrus, slight sweetness

name: Phoenix
description: Aromas of spice, pine, chocolate and molasses
